content: **design details** ● short pullover in stockinette stitch with lace and cable pattern in front ● seamless worked in one piece ● worked top down ● long sleeve ● sleeves worked in the round ● short row are added to shape the neckline the pullover is worked from a combination of a chart and written instructions **finished size** after wet blocking chest 100 cm/ 39 3 lenght 60 cm/ 23 6 **yarn suggested ** worsted or aran weight yarn **note about ribbing ** suggested to use smaller needle as your project needle for the ribbing parts another way to make the ribbing part stretchy and attractive knit the ribbing k1 p1tbl use your preferred way
